Players: meet junior golf coaches

Sign up for the fastest way to get recognized by NCAA golf coaches. With 2,400 college golf programs nationwide, putting your Master Score on display narrows the field as you compete for the attention of college junior golf coaches.

Coaches: find and recruit top talent

Find your next star

How it works

Junior Golf Hub is a tool for athletes age 14 to 18, their parents, and college golf recruiters seeking top talent.

Athletes and their parents create a unique profile with junior golf tournament scores, stats and academic performance. Follow colleges and direct message coaches when you meet their search criteria. .

Coaches and assistant coaches: hightlight your academic and college golf programs to attract talented athletes. Rank athletes by a unique Master Score covering academic progress, tournament progress, player development scores and mental profiles.
